original_text: So Jesus spoke to the teachers of God's Law. He said, ‘Come here and listen to me.’ He used stories to explain to them, ‘Satan would not fight against himself!
korean_text: 예수께서 그들을 불러다가 비유로 말씀하시되 사탄이 어찌 사탄을 쫓아낼 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: So Jesus spoke to the teachers of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 예수님은 하나님의 율법 교사들에게 말씀하셨다

sentences.original_text: He said, 'Come here and listen to me'
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말했다, '이리 와서 내 말을 들어라'

sentences.original_text: He used stories to explain to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 설명하기 위해 비유를 사용하셨다
